channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road is continuously messy, 25th November
item.description:
The street cleaner was here today did a half job and spent most his time on the phone please bring back the previous guy he took much more pride in keeping our road tidy.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Alconbury Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping near bungalows, 25th November
item.description:
This is a council estate so I don’t know why Southwark has emailed me this. Thank you for reporting this matter. Following our investigation, no action can be taken because it is the responsibility of non-local authority or privately owned/operated organisation. Your case is closed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15, Norcroft Gardens, East Dulwich, London Borough of Southwark

item.title: Daily Fly Tipping by Residents next to Conway Primary School, 25th November
item.description:
Morning you will note we have complained about this previously - neighbouring properties are fly tipping their non recyclable rubbish next to the bin in Bebington Road off of Gallosson Road - the main culprit is Mr Paramveer Singh,70 Conway Road, SE18 1AR. Please see attached evidence we opened 3 bags this morning and found items addressed to him. This is happening on a daily basis and currently being cleared by our premises manager as is right next to the school and utilises much of his time in the morning.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Gallosson Road, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
